com.company

Class GoFish

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.GoFish

  • public class GoFish
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for the Go Fish game. Holds all of the logic for taking turns, keeping score, swapping cards, etc...

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • GoFish

        public GoFish(int numPlayers)
        Constructor for the class.
        Parameters:
        numPlayers - The number of players to play the game. (anything above 4 will be set back to 4).

    • Method Detail

      • takeTurn

        public boolean takeTurn(Player p,
                        int playerIndex,
                        int requestVal)
        Takes a single turn for a player
        Parameters:
        p - Player who is taking the turn
        playerIndex - Which player to choose a card from (1-4)
        requestVal - Values of the card to request
        Returns:
        True if the turn was valid. Fales if not.
